You don't have to know anything about Hindi to use L-Lingo Hindi to equip yourself to converse in Hindi. In our 65 lessons, you have the option to learn in the Hindi script, or in the Latin characters familiar from Western European countries. L-Lingo is designed to be easy to use. It exploits multimedia channels - words, recordings of native speech, and pictures - to enable you to grasp Hindi words and phrases useful on the road, when mingling with Hindi speakers, in day-to-day or family life, and when working. - Thousands of words and sentences -all visualized with images - Full native speaker pronunciation - Clear and easy to understand design of the program - Switch between Hindi Script or the more easy to read Phonetic Script - Grammar Notes See a pineapple in a supermarket, and the correct Hindi word pops into your head! Thanks to L-Lingo, you have learned the word visually, as well as by listening and reading. Our Hindi lessons make you learn Hindi words and phrases quickly. Before you know it, you can easily utter Hindi words and Hindi sentences! L-Lingo immerses you in the sights and sounds of the Hindi language, rather than just the written word. The multi-channel learning approach achieves results much quicker than traditional textbook approaches. Our Hindi 65 lessons cover the following: - Introductions & Greetings - At Home - At the Airport - At the Hotel - Colors - Food - At the Office - Professions - Numbers - Clothes - Telling the Time in Hindi - Animals - Meals and Cooking - Asking Questions in Hindi - Buying and Selling - Landscapes and Nature - Weather - Sports - Family and Relationships - Countries and Continents - Seasons - Shopping - Days, Weeks, Months etc. - Quantities and Shapes - Present, Past and Future tenses Any problems or have feedback on how to improve the App, email us before negative comment. We will reply quickly. http://l-lingo.com/helpdesk
Catch as many cats as you can in your basket. Help the big cat climb to new heights. Endless cute, crazy fun.

LOOK NO FURTHER. This is the perfect app to help you on your physics homework. Perfect for students of Physics at any level. No more late nights, no more trying to figure out what the teacher meant. As a recent student of a Physics class, I've designed an app that I think would be most beneficial to students of Physics. In this full version there are over 65 different equations and references for almost all constants in Physics. This full version includes equations and variables from: -Atomic and Nuclear Physics -Electricity and Magnetism -Fluid Mechanics and Thermal Physics -Newtonian Mechanics -Waves and Optics This app includes an "Equation" section to browse through different types of equations. Just enter in numbers into the correct text box and leave one text box blank for the app to solve. It also includes an "Equation Finder" section. If you do not know what formula to use, enter in your givens and find the equation that is right for you!

Sammlung von mehr als 1000 SMS zum Thema: Beziehungen und Liebe. Alle SMS sind in Kategorien je nach Situation eingeteilt. Es gibt SMS extra für Frauen, es gibt SMS extra für Männer. Für jede Situation angepasst: Liebeserklärung, Einladung, Komplimente, liebevolle SMS, vermisse dich-SMS, Trennung u.s.w. Die Anwendung benötigt keinen Internetzugang. Sie können Ihren eigenen Bereich mit Favoriten-SMS sammeln, interessante SMS in die Zwischenablage kopieren, jede beliebige SMS in fremde Anwendungen übertragen, zum Beispiel in Anwendungen für SMS-Versand. Collection of more than 1000 text messages on the topic: relationships and love. All SMS messages are divided into categories depending on the situation. There are SMS especially for women, there are SMS specially for men. For each situation, adapted: declaration of love, invitation, compliments, loving SMS, separation miss you text messages, etc. The application does not require Internet access. You can collect your own range of favorite SMS, SMS interesting copy to the clipboard, transfer any SMS to foreign applications, for example in applications for sending SMS messages.
Blast the UFOs to save the universe.

description: Become proficient at Microsoft Excel at your leisure or on-the-go absolutely FREE! SoloLearn’s Excel app is a comprehensive tutorial with more than 27 video lessons, interactive checkpoints, and quizzes. Our hands-on exercises and interactive lessons cover a wide range of topics, including Excel Basics, Formulas, Forms, Formatting, and more. And you can do it all wherever you happen to be - at home, in a café, even on a bus or a train. Whether you want to advance your career or simply add to your skill set, we guarantee you will learn with this FREE tutorial!

Great White Shark HD. Free Video Live Wallpaper. Realistic video wallpaper with the great white shark, also known as the great white, white pointer, or white death. The great white shark is an apex predator of the seas and has no natural predators. Main features: - Free! - Saves to the SD card by default. - Adjustable speed (frame rate). - Do not affect battery life time. - Compatible with many smartphones and tablets. HOW TO INSTALL: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpaper Personalize your smartphone with this beautiful live wallpaper!

Plug in for Tasker and Locale which allows execution of commands on a remote machine via an SSH connection. Supports password authentication and shared key authentication using openSSH dsa or rsa keys. Supports variable substitution so you can use your tasker variables in your commands. Allows access to the output of your command via tasker variable. THIS APP REQUIRES EITHER TASKER OR LOCALE TO BE INSTALLED, IT WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT THEM find it under plugins/ssh command. input the ip or hostname of the remote machine (and port if necessary), your user name on the remote machine and either a password or select your local private key file. choose the correct authentication method. The plugin will remember these details for any other tasks you create to run commands on the remote machine, Enter the command you want to run on the remote machine and then you can use tasker to run them via button, shortcut, menu, condition or any of taskers many other options. At the moment both rsa and dsa keyfiles are supported (i.e. keys generated by ssh-keygen or connectbot), To use keys generated in putty (puttygen) use the "export as openssh" option from the menu to obtain a key in the correct format.
release_text: v1.1.5 Local variable for output doesn't work for some people so output is now returned to global tasker variable %SSH_OUT v1.1.4 Bug fixed from previous release

description: Board Skin for UCCW App. UCCW (Ultimate Custom Clock Widget) free. Before Downloading this skin, make sure UCCW 2.1.2 or higher is already installed on your device : http://goo.gl/SSScQ ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Install : 1 - Once you've downloaded/installed the skin, 2 - Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen (via long press on homescreen if you're running a launcher or via appdrawer if you're on stock ROM), 3 - Chose 4x2 Widget Size 4 - When UCCW skins' list pops up, choose the skin to apply(There should be a orange dot next to the skin on the right of the screen) 5 - Touch the pic 6 - Enjoy ;) ----------------------------------------------- Tips: - In the UCCW menu, if skin downloaded got a location and/or weather element, set the location to auto (if it's enable, then disable and enable it again for the location to work properly). - In UCCW skin's list, long press a skin to delete it. - UCCW Skin cannot be edited, the app doesn't allow it. - Any problems with Skin contact me via email, and if any problems with app go here to the XDA thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1386987

description: INDISPENSABLE! Allows quick access to call or send sms to contacts/numbers you have contacted recently/frequently. · Unlike others, you don't need to configure it manually. It auto select your contacts/numbers depending on the frequency and age of calls and sms. · You can manage a list of numbers that the widget should not show. · See stats and last communications for a phone number. · 4 sizes: - 8 contacts - 4 contacts - 3 contacts - Smart list shortcut This is a WIDGET, so you can't open it as a normal app. To add a widget to your desktop, do a long press on a free space of the home screen and select "add widget". ** WARNING FOR TASK KILLER APPS USERS **: be sure that your task killer is configured to ignore this app, in other case, the widget can be frozen. NOTE: I can't answer to your comments here, please send me an e-mail to request a new feature, to report a bug or to get help on any issue related with this widget. You can also contact me using twitter (@SPCamposAndroid) You can also visit the FAQ section of the web.

Llega la nueva Guía de las Ligas de AS con toda la información y estadísticas de la liga de fútbol española, europea, chilena y colombiana de 2015-2016. La aplicación incluye información y análisis de los 20 equipos de la Liga BBVA, estadísticas de los equipos y sus jugadores, equipaciones y fichajes más relevantes de la temporada : Kroos, James, Luis Suárez, Bravo, Griezmann, Mandzukic, con la actualización instantánea de información sobre calendarios de todas las fechas, goleadores, ranking y noticias durante la temporada. Esta actualización incluye información de las picas de AS. La Guía de la Liga AS además de la Liga BBVA, también ofrece información de la Liga Adelante, la Copa del Rey, la Premier League, la Serie A, la Bundesliga, la Ligue 1 y las grandes competiciones continentales: Liga de Campeones y Europa League. Ahora también podrás seguir la liga Chilena, Campeonato Scotiabank, y la liga Colombiana, Liga Águila. Si te gusta la Liga de fútbol, ésta es tu Guía para conocer todos los detalles del fútbol español, europeo y latinoamericano. POR QUÉ DESGARGARTE LA GUÍA: 1) Carrusel en Directo. Todos los detalles de los partidos con información actualizada y visual al momento: resultados, goles, cambios, alineaciones, tarjetas, etc. Además si eres un jugón futbolero, te informamos antes que nadie Las Picas de AS de la mano de nuestros cronistas. 2) Nuevas competiciones. Añadimos más competiciones para que lo sepas todo del fútbol europeo: Serie A, Premier League, Bundesliga y Ligue 1 (liga francesa). Además de toda la liga de España: Liga BBVA, Adelante, Liga de Campeones, Europa League y La Copa del Rey.  Ahora podrás disfrutar de las Ligas de Latinoamérica; Campeonato Scotiabank y Liga Águila. 3) Buscador y comparador. Por si las dudas futbolísticas no te dejan dormir, incorporamos un acceso directo al buscador con todo el detalle de la información y estadísticas que necesites de cada jugador y equipos. El comparador permite seleccionar jugadores, competición y temporada y conocer al dedillo como lo están haciendo. 4) Estadísticas. Datos estadísticos, análisis y palmarés con un histórico de hasta 10 años, tanto de los equipos como de sus jugadores. Objetividad vs. Corazón a golpe de vista.Y para que no te pierdas nada, te ofrecemos la clasificación de todas las competiciones. 5) Las Picas de AS. En esta temporada 2014-2015, la Guía de la Liga te ofrece Las Picas de AS para que las tengas antes que nadie. ******************************* Si te gusta el fútbol, ésta es tu Guía! description: Can't you find where you have parked your car after Rolling Stones concert? Have you gone to buy an ice-cream and now you are not able to find your sunbed on crowded beach? Have you been caught by a fog on trip in unknown terrain and you can't find right direction? Or, for another reason, do you need to know your actual location and eventually direction to chosen place? And your mobile navigation doesn't work, because you can't access internet connection? Then you would appreciate this compass and simple direction indicator. From version 1.2 you can also run Google Navigation to navigate you to the choosen target or show this location on the map.

Follow the step-by-step instructions to create Easter. Playing is fun and will add a lot the development of motoric skills. This puzzle game is really for all ages. Bring the bricks together and follow the color pattern. Create an easter bunny, chicken, rabbit, egg and much more! The larger pieces allow children to use the blocks with their own small hands. They will lose their imagination with these kinds of three dimensional designs. Let your creativity go and try alternative colors or add small changes. Let the youngest play and be surprised with the results. Create those elegot figures and get the real and legot figures. These games are intended to play with colorful interlocking plastic building block toys. The blocks can be assembled and connected in many ways to construct such objects as vehicles, animals, buildings and even working robots. Anything constructed can be taken apart again and the pieces can be used to make other objects. Help your child as a parent and you will be surprised how fast the children will pick up the game. Take a picture and post the creation online. Happy faces will follow and your family and friend club will enjoy. This kid puzzle needs a set of building blocks like lego or mega bloks. Start with a basic set and have fun exploring this game. The step-by-step instructions are intended to let your kids get more out of these beautiful toys. Most duplo or mega blocks come with limited instructions. These instructions will help you to get the most out of the toys. There are also alternative sets available. If you like to play with building blocks, then this puzzle game is definitely for you! Have fun with these great constructions. Features: - Easy and clean user interface - Free puzzles - Nice graphics - For all ages - Share creations on social media

Thanks you very much for downloading and installing Fireworks HD Live Wallpaper . It's a free HD live wallpaper which you'll enjoy using during valentines love days! You'll really love it! This app will show you different pictures for each screen as Live Wallpaper. But you can always set your own pictures folder!

Masjid Timetable does what no other masjid app does. It gives you your very own LOCAL masjid salah times. Now, you don't have to download generic apps and then adjust for your locality, minutes, degrees and variations. If you receive a piece of paper every month from your masjid (which you hang on the wall) and then refer to every time you need to know the beginning time or the jamaat time within the masjid, then this app will be extremely convenient for you. Simply pull out your phone, press the app button - Lo! the beginning & jamaat times are displayed right there in front of you, for that same day. Furthermore, you can view the whole month's timetable too. Just swipe one way and its all available, whether it be beginning or jamaat times. You also have the ability to input a secondary masjid. This way, you can check the monthly timetable for that masjid too. So how does this work? Masjid organisers/members visit the lentrica software site at http://www.lentricasoftware.com/masjid They download our MS excel template, fill it in (or paste from own excel sheet) with times spanning as long as they want and then re-upload it back to our site. As soon as that file is uploaded back to our site, every person who has this app can immediately use the timetable for that masjid within the app. If your own masjid has not yet uploaded their times, obtain the masjid's timetable in excel format and simply copy from that file into our template. Then upload it and inshallah, for every person who uses that timetable within the app, you shall receive a reward.

Do you have what it takes to restore balance in the world of dreams? Children all across the globe are unable to wake up. Some evil force is holding them in the world of dreams. It is up to you and your buddy Ted to save them! Note: This app is still in beta. Not all levels are completed and you might encounter some bugs. All feedback if much appreciated. Contact me by email or on twitter (@Kevlanche).
release_text: == v0.5.0 == * Public beta! Most polished and content rich version to date * Added entire forest+cave world (including bosses!) * Added time attack mode * Added support for up to 3 game profiles As always, follow @Kevlanche on Twitter for the latest info and for an ability to affect the development of the game! == v0.4.0 == * New level * A gazillion(*) bug fixes (*) Not actually a gazillion.

description: Daily Feed is our vision of an RSS reader done right. The feature set has been distilled to the bare essentials and we think that's a good thing. The user interface is simple, clean and fast, and as a reader you have access to the features you need, when you need them, without distractions. We have taken advantage of the latest coding practices and user interface patterns to implement a fluid and modern experience which puts content first while preserving your device's power and data allowances. Daily Feed strives to preserve your privacy by using secure communications wherever possible and avoiding the storage of personal data such as login credentials. Besides standard RSS feeds, the app also features built-in support for podcasts. In order to use Daily Feed you will need an account with a feed aggregator service. Currently supported services are: - Feedly - InoReader - The Old Reader Our objective is to support as many services as possible. For that purpose, the application has been designed from the ground up with extensibility in mind. If you know of, or have a service which you would like to see supported, please contact us.
release_text: 1.7.1 - Fixed Feedly logging out frequently - Other small bug fixes 1.6.0 - Optional dark theme - Interface improvements

Welcome to Hello Switzerland! Hello Switzerland is the number one source of information and inspiration for Switzerland’s international community. Whether you're considering a move to Switzerland, you're already an expat in Switzerland, or you're a long-term resident of the country, you'll find Hello Switzerland useful. Designed to make relocating to Switzerland and settling in easier, Hello Switzerland is packed with features to make your Swiss experience a success. Those already living in Switzerland will find the Hello Switzerland Directories and the Around-Me functionality an essential part of day-to-day life. Check out Hello Switzerland’s great features: - Step by Step: The unique and powerful self-relocation guide for Switzerland - Around Me: See what’s in your immediate vicinity in Switzerland - Directories: find places and services of interest and use to expats and Switzerland's international community with the Hello Switzerland Directories. - Guides & Assistance: our exclusive articles to make relocation, settling into and living in Switzerland easy. Don’t waste time sorting through information to find what you need... Find the right information! Hello Switzerland Guides & Assistance cover key topics in detail, personalized to your individual situation. Choose your relocation phase from Hello Switzerland’s 5 phases: deciding, planning, arriving, living and departing. Choose your Swiss region of interest – we cover Fribourg, Geneva, Basel, Berne, Lausanne, Luzern, Neuchâtel, Schaffhausen, Solothurn, Ticino, Zug, and Zurich. Plus: Biel/Bienne and Winterthur are covered under Bern and Zurich. - Events: find out what’s going on around the country for expats and Switzerland's international community - Interactive community features: rate and share your experiences on the fly - add comments, photos and reviews, share your tips for the Directory, and more! Say hello to Hello Switzerland!
release_text: Version 1.3 Major new feature. Here is Step by Step, our unique and powerful self-relocation guide for Switzerland. It makes moving to Switzerland and settling-in a breeze. Welcome to Hello Switzerland. Version 1.2 - Around Me, the unique Hello Switzerland map search, can now be set to display Points of Interest at a distance of 1km, 2km, 5km or 10km from your location. - We made it easier to upload your own photos to Points of Interest in the Hello Switzerland Directory.

An free little time waster. Watch up to four different types of critters explore randomly generated mazes. Each critter has its own method of trying to escape the maze. The butterfly moves randomly and may or may not ever find its way out. The gerbil follows the wall on its left or on its right until it finds the exit. The bird prefers to plow straight though the maze but remember when a path found a dead end. Eventually the bird will eliminate all paths except the route to the exit. The ant keeps track of how many times it has followed a path and chooses the path it has used the least. This allows the ant to cover the entire maze as efficiently as possible.

description: Have you heard of the health benefits of a raw food diet? Looking for a healthy way to change your diet, improve your health, and try new things? Enjoy this collection of healthy raw food recipes, with useful tips & tricks, and unlock the secret benefits of a raw food diet today! Chef Rod Rotondi, owner of successful raw food restaurant chain New Leaf, demonstrates that going raw is fun, easy, and delicious! Learn the fundamentals of preparing your own raw foods at home, including setting up your raw kitchen, transitioning to raw foods, and raising your family on a raw food diet. This app includes a wealth of recipes for smoothies, breakfast, appetizers, soups, salads, dressings, dinners, and desserts, and even includes some international cuisine! Rotondi demonstrates that the best way to go green and get healthy is to eat fresh food in its natural state. Features: - Clean design with intuitive navigation - Easy-to-read zoom feature - Add Notes - Add to favourites - Copy text - Share recipes with friends and family via social media and email Enjoy and experience a new raw food lifestyle with these tasty recipes and meal prep ideas today!

description: Auf Turnieren starten soll Spaß machen. Dazu gehört auch, Ärger und Stress so weit es geht zu vermeiden. Hierfür ist es unter anderem hilfreich, die Regeln rund um Parcours und Dressurviereck genau zu kennen. Und wir haben festgestellt: Es sind häufig die gleichen oder ähnliche Fragen, die gestellt werden und die zur Verunsicherung bei den Aktiven führen. BAYERNS PFERDE hat deshalb die Serie „Darf der das?“ ins Leben gerufen. Hier haben erfahrene Richter die Fragen unserer Leser ausführlich beantwortet. Die App umfasst - Wichtige Fragen und Antworten zu den fünf Themenbereichen Meldestelle/Startfolge, Auf dem Abreiteplatz, In der Abteilung, Die Prüfung und Die Ausrüstung - Den Bereich LPO, in dem die wichtigsten Regeln beschrieben und aufgeführt werden - Eine Favoritenfunktion mit der wichtige Fragen gespeichert und schnell abgerufen werden können Ein handliches Nachschlagewerk für unterwegs ist es geworden, praxisorientiert und lebens- bzw. turniernah. Viel Spaß beim Lesen und vor allem eine erfolgreiche Turniersaison! Should start at tournaments are fun. This includes, anger and stress as much as possible to avoid. For this purpose, it is useful, among other things, to know the rules about course and dressage ring exactly. And we have found that it is often the same or similar questions are asked and that lead to uncertainty among assets. BAVARIA'S HORSES therefore the series "Can he do this?" Launched. Here experienced judges have answered the questions our readers in detail. The app includes - Important questions and answers to the five thematic areas reporting office / startup sequence on the warm-up arena, in the department, Testing and Equipment - The area LPO, are described in the most important rules and performed - A favorite function with the important questions can be stored and retrieved quickly A handy reference book on the go, it has become practical and life-or turniernah. Enjoy your reading and mainly successful show season!

Since 1975, India Today has covered its fascinating namesake without fear or favour, with insight, accuracy, thoroughness and a well rounded perspective on a variety of subjects - be it the economy, politics, lifestyle, the arts, entertainment, travel, science, technology or health. That's why India Today is the country's most widely read publication, a position it has held for more than a decade. And that's why it makes sense to subscribe to India Today. India Today app brings you the latest news from India and around the world about politics, business, sports, lifestyle, etc. Also, track the latest from bollywood, hollywood, regional film industries and TV channels. Путеводитель по Праге, одному из самых красивых городов мира. Что может приложение Путеводитель по Праге Путеводитель: - полная поддержка русского языка; - справочная информацию о более чем 50 достопримечательностях: описание, адреса, стоимость, график работы, номер телефона и др.; - сохранение самых интересных объектов в списке избранных; - отображение расстояния и направления до ближайших достопримечательностей. Схема метро: - актуальная схема метро Праги; - рассчет количества станций и времени движения между станциями; - поиск ближайшей станции и расстояния до нее. Также в путеводитель включены объекты не только самой Праги, но и ее окрестностей. Для получения доступа к Оффлайн картам Праги установите Pro версию. Позволяет без доступа в интернет получить информацию о множестве самых интересных достопримечательностях Праги. Приложение Прага Путеводитель удобно использовать даже в роуминге, получая координаты посредством GPS. Guide to Prague, one of the most beautiful cities in the world. What can the app Prague Guide Guide - Full support for Russian language; - Background information on more than 50 things: description, location, cost, schedule, phone number, etc.; - Preservation of the most interesting objects in the favorites list; - Shows the distance and direction to nearby attractions. Metro map: - Actual subway map of Prague; - Calculation of the number of stations and travel time between stations; - Find the nearest station and the distance to it. Also included in the guide not only the objects of Prague, but also its surroundings. To access the offline map of Prague install Pro version. Allows free access to the Internet to get information about many of the most interesting sights of Prague. Prague Travel Guide app is useful even while roaming, receiving the coordinates via GPS.

200만 명이 선택한 홈웨이트트레이닝이 더 세련된 디자인과 UI의 패션근육만들기로 업데이트 되었습니다. 홈웨이트트레이닝, 패션근육만들기는 불필요한 운동은 제거하고 꼭 필요한 운동만 소개하여 부담을 줄이고 높은 효과를 얻을 수 있도록 구성되었습니다. 많은 이용 바랍니다. -------------------------- ✔ 무료어플 전체 2위 (7월 14일 부터 약 2주간) ✔ 건강 및 피트니스 카테고리 1위 (7월 13일 부터 약 3주간) ✔ 스마트한 앱 포털 팟게이트 신규무료 1위 (11.7.13) ✔ 스마트한 앱 포털 팟게이트 무료 부분 전체카테고리 2위(11.7.13) ✔ 머니투데이 오늘의 앱에 선정(11.7.18)외 언론보도 10곳 적당히 보기 좋은 근육질의 몸, 알고 보면 집에서도 충분히 만들 수 있습니다. 이제 아까운 시간과 돈 써가며 헬스장 가지 마시고 집에서 홈웨이트트레이닝으로 자신 있는 몸 만드세요. 딱 주 4일, 하루 15~20분 투자면 당신도 해변에서 자신 있게 웃통을 벗을 수 있습니다. 물론 운동시간을 더 늘리시면 더 빠른 근육증강이 가능합니다. 어플 속 모델은 개발자 본인이며, 평균 주 5일 하루 15분 단위로 하루 두 부위씩 약 한달 간 운동한 상태입니다. 특이 이런 분들께 홈웨이트트레이닝을 추천해드립니다. - 일이 끝나고 나면 너무 피곤해서 헬스장 가기가 너무 힘드신 분들 - 매 여름마다 헬스장만 등록하면 몇 일만 가다가 안 가셔서 돈을 낭비하시는 분들 - 헬스장갈 돈이 없는 용돈쟁이 학생들 - 헬즈장 등록과 보충제까지 먹자니 자금 부담이 크신 분들(보충제만 사고 운동은 집에서!) - 인터넷에서 쉽게 구매 가능한 조립형 덤벨 (약 2~3만 원) - 의자 - 주변의 학교나 공원에 있는 철봉이나 평행봉 1. 가슴 -내로우스탠스푸쉬업 -와이드스텐스푸쉬업 -밀리터리푸쉬업 -디클라인푸쉬업 -플로어덤벨벤치프레스 2. 다리 -스쿼트 -덤벨런지 3. 등 -Y레이즈 -풀업 -벤트오버덤벨로우 4. 어깨 -리어 레터럴 레이즈 -아놀드프레스 -프론트레이즈 -사이드레터럴레이즈 -아놀드프레스 5. 복근 -크런치 -리버스크런치 -사이드크런치 -바이시클 크런치 6. 팔 - 덤벨오버헤드 트라이셉스 익스텐션 - 벤치딥스 -바벨컬 -바벨리버스컬 -리스트컬 -레버리지 바 엑서사이즈 200 million people have chosen a more sophisticated home weight training in fashion design and the UI has been updated to make muscle. description: The children in the school bus need to be driven to the school without delay. Play Drive School Bus Games and proceed through the levels but make sure that you do not crash while driving as the students should not get injured. If you love any sort of Drive School Bus Games then you will love this selection of school bus games. Driving a school bus is a big responsibility where you have to get the passengers where they want to go safely, but also quickly. This selection of school bus games has a variety of different themes but they all involve driving buses in some way. Not many people get to experience what it is like to drive a bus and so these games can give you the closest thing to this. They can be a lot of fun but also test some skills. This can make it more exciting as a bus can be quite different to drive than a car or truck. If you like any car games, then it is worth having a look but if you particularly like buses then you will really love them. The Drive School Bus Games are kept updated and so if new games that look good appear, then these are added to the selection on the site. This means that it is worth revisiting the site regularly to see what has been added. You can also return to play your favorite games as often as you like as there is no charge and no restrictions on how many times you can play. It is therefore well worth taking a look and trying out lots of the games to find out which ones you will want to play again.

Hey Member! Your beloved Virgin Mobile smartphone just wants to help. And when you hook it up with the My Account app, beautiful things can happen at the swipe of a finger. Pay your bill, grab a travel bundle before your shopping trip to NYC, add a buddy to your list. It’s all right there, and it’s all about making things easy, so you have more time to do awesome things. Or just to waste, if it’s one of those days. Here’s a bunch of stuff you can do with the app: • Set up auto payments • Check out your voice, data and text usage • Manage your My Buddies contacts • Add or remove add-ons (including travel passes) • Check out your plan details We’ll never charge you data when you use it on our 3G, 4G and LTE networks, the app works on WiFi, and the red colour scheme makes it perfect for angering bulls, if that’s something that might be helpful. Heads Up! If you’re using Android 4.0 and above, awesome! If you’re on an earlier version, please check out our mobile site at myaccount.virginmobile.ca/mobile to do your account stuff.The My Account app is only available to monthly members. Heads Up Part 2! If you use any data compression apps on your phone, you’ll need to log in before you can use the app. Learn more about app permissions : virginmobile.ca/privacy Love, Virgin Mobile Website: virginmobile.ca/contactus Email: hello@virginmobile.ca Phone: 1-888-999-2321
release_text: • Enhanced in-app navigation ('Back' button) • Various bug fixes

description: Stream live TV from HDHomeRun to Android Tablet/Phone/TV devices Features: - Supports all HDHomeRun models, including legacy models (HDHR3-US, HDHR2-US, HDHR3-EU) - Supports TV Guide on selected countries with HDHomeRun DLNA models (Connect, Extend, and DVB-T2) - Full Hardware MPEG2 & H264 decoder on Android Media Player based on RockChip/AMLogic/AllWinner SOCs - Full Hardware MPEG2 & H264 decoder on Kindle FireTV Box - Full Hardware H264 decoding for most Android devices when a HDHomeRun Extended is used - High performance software decoder for devices without Hardware decoder. HD SW decoding requires Nvidia Tegra 4+/Qualcomm Snapdragon 600+/Intel Atom 3xxx+ - Channel grid as an overlay for fast and easier channel surfing. - Full Gesture/Keyboard/Remote Control/Gamepad navigation support. - Automatically sync favorite channels from HDHomeRun device Supported HDHomeRun models: - HDHomeRun DUAL US&CA(HDHR3-US & HDHR2-US) - HDHomeRun DUAL EU (HDHR3-EU) - HDHomeRun PRIME (HDHR3-CC) - HDHomeRun EXTEND (HDTC-2US) - HDHomeRun CONNECT (HDHR4-2US) - HDHomeRun 4DC (HDHR3-4DC) Note: - Use "Type A" decoder to enable MPEG2 & H.264 Hardware decoding for most Android Media Box/Stick devices using RockChip/AMLogic/AllWinner SOCs. No HDHomeRun Extended required. - Not all video/audio codecs are supported and In-App Purchase may be required. - HD video Software Decoding requires Nvidia Tegra 4+/Qualcomm Snapdragon 600+/Intel Atom 3xxx+/Rockchip RK3288+ - HD video may also require a WIFI AC or WIFI N running on 5Ghz. A wired network is recommended. - Only SD video is supported on slower devices with WiFi G Wireless. - Tegra2 devices are not supported (Moto Xoom, Asus Transformer 1, etc) Please visit http://instatv.org for more information
release_text: Release 20150701: - New: App renamed to just "InstaTV" - New: TV Guide support with HDHR3-CC, HDHR4-*, HDTC-*. - New: Channel grid shows current program image, title, and progress (as a pie chart) - New: Improved overlay to show program details - New: Android TV Live Channel with guide support (Nexus Player, ADT-1, Nvidia Shield TV, and Forge TV) - New: Automaticaly show guide overlay to notify the start of next program See website for details.

For all French recipes lovers we present very cool French cookbook. Birth place of French recipes is from France. French fries are very common dish in all countries. With almost all dishes French fries will go good like burgers, wraps etc. French fries are as famous as French kiss. A evening with your girlfriend with a hot refreshing coffee and some french fries and having a french kiss and this evening will be every romantic feeling. There are many authentic French restaurants across the world. Those who love cooking always love to try different food recipes. Cheese and wine are the major part of french recipe. French food recipes are normally eaten by hand and later in food recipes changes happened. French toast is a famous french food. In epicurious we find a long list of delicious recipes french toast. The sauces in french cook book are very thick and heavily seasoned which add a special taste to the french food. French toast are of different type. The taste and appearance of French toast completely when the ingredients changes. Salted beef and pork are very traditional french dishes. French chefs have great demand around the world and they are very much experted in french cooking. French app provide all the delicious french recipes. French fries french recipe and french kiss have a very good relation. In french cookbook many item for french recipe are been preserved in honey, spices, etc. French food recipes in french cookbook are very attractive when compared to other food recipes. French recipes add color to food with juices of spinach and green part of leeks. Epicurious have easy french recipes for starter in cooking. French cooking can be made complicated and also simple. Yellow color for the french recipes are added with saffron and also UK and USA they use this. The red color for french food is given by sunflower. French food recipe have very much resemblance with south African and Philippines France food. Food in France have very importance for soup recipes. Epicurious have very authentic French soup recipes. Soup recipes are in both vegetarian and non vegetarian. Many consider French cookbook as national cuisine. All over the world there are plenty of french food recipes lovers. French soup recipes recipes are advised as diet food and it is very healthy. There are French recipe in French cookbook which can be suggested for diabetic patients. Easy french recipes are very healthy food and which can be used as a diet food. Spanish and French cookbook have many similarities. French fries is usually known as an American dish. French apps are very much useful for French cooking. Main dish in recipes french toast is egg. Chinese cuisines also use recipes french toast. Strict diet is needed for an healthy life. French cooking have a very prominent place in Italian cuisine also. French food lovers really love restaurants having french toast with very tasty and authentic recipes french toast. Without even watching or tasting we can identify kitchen with authentic french cooking with the addictive smell from the french recipe. Buttery shrimp and pasta on of the tastiest dish in French cookbook. Basil Cream Chicken have very creamy taste and all love these french recipes. Crepes is a food in France. French cookbook are very similar to the cook book in Canada and Australia. The apples for french cooking comes mainly from Newzealand. Enjoy cooking with French cookbook. Happy cooking :)!!!!
release_text: NEW FEATURES --New exciting feature of RELATED RECIPES where we give recipes that you would LOVE to try at the end of each recipes you choose. --New EXPLORE option to get surprise recipes for new cooking experience. --You can add ingredients to the shopping list and share the list to make your cooking easier. -- Now you can share the joy of cooking with your friends by recipe share. Happy cooking :)

description: Do you love great history? Do you love facts, lists and trivia? Are you fascinated by the Civil War? Nurses in the War Must See - Sites Slave Work Songs George Armstrong Custer Phoebe Pember - Hospital Matron Civil War Myths Gettysburg - Day 1 Other Civil Wars Naming the War Surrender of New Orleans More Myths About the War Personal Stories of Heroes The Magnificent Cake The Greatest Charges Lee's Retreat From Gettysburg Summary of the Generals Disguised as a Man Harriet Tubman - Spy Lee After the War The Civil War By The Numbers Death and the War Frequently Asked Questions Daily Life During the War Life as a Soldier Best Civil War Books Ever! Georgia Civil War Sites ......and much much more Updates added frequently... more lists and articles added regularly... All lists and articles are stored on your device and will work with or without Wifi.

description: Quiz / Trivia game about the culture of Metal music, by a metalhead, for metalheads. The app is still in development but there are already three quiz game modes: - 20 random questions - Full package (290 questions) - Survival: try to make the longest streak of correct answers as possible You can also submit your own questions! They will be reviewed and eventually added in the next update of the quiz. Score high and you will appear in the Hall of Fame, the world 99 most knowledgeable metalheads! If you have noticed bugs, wrong questions/answers, or if you want to suggest new questions or improvements, please send an e-mail: antheu.incorporation@gmail.com (Just in case Google algorithm didn't get it, this a quiz about metal music, not a quiz about something that would not be metal music, and surely enough not a metal detector)

description: This version of our app was created for organizational use only. If you have not been provided with a specific activation code, you are not eligible to use this app. If you’d like to purchase an individual copy, please search for Essential Anatomy 3, which is also available on the Play Store. The best selling human anatomy app ever is now available on Android. To try out the technology please try out the free version for Essential Skeleton: Essential Skeleton which is also on Google Play ***** Number 1 Medical mobile app in over 95 countries worldwide ***** Groundbreaking 3D Technology - No competitor competes with graphics and medical accuracy ***** Tuaw: "Make no mistake about it: Essential Anatomy by 3D4Medical is the future of touch-based anatomy learning."Essential Anatomy is an app every doctor, physiotherapist, OT, nurse and medical student should own." ***** Award Wining App - Hundreds of features that make learning and referencing easy Visit our www.3d4medical.com website and watch a video that highlights the functionality and quality of Essential Anatomy as well as our "Coming Soon" section that highlights new features currently in development. You'll understand why it is the world's Number 1 Medical App! Here is the link: http://applications.3d4medical.com/help_essential_anatomy_android or press the link to our website ESSENTIAL ANATOMY 3 Essential Anatomy 3 represents the latest in groundbreaking 3D technology and innovative design. A cutting edge 3D graphics engine, custom built by 3D4Medical from the ground up, powers a highly-detailed anatomical model and delivers outstanding quality graphics that no other competitor can achieve. The app represents a unique approach to learning general anatomy. The graphics are unparalleled and make learning, through the use of informative content and innovative features, a rich and engaging experience. This app includes essential anatomy for 10 systems: ⁃Skeletal ⁃Muscles ⁃Connective Tissue ⁃Veins ⁃Arteries ⁃Nerves ⁃Respiratory ⁃Digestive ⁃Urinary ⁃Lymphatic ⁃also includes the Brain and Heart NEW 3D TECHNOLOGY Essential Anatomy 3 is responsive, visually stunning and effortless. The app is fully 3D, meaning that you can view any anatomic structure in isolation, as well as from any angle. EFFORTLESS NAVIGATION & FUNCTIONALITY Clever functionality found within the app allows the user to strip away layers of muscle via the ‘scalpel’ tool. This app provides users with the ability to turn on/off systems without the need to deselect individual structures or muddle through a multitude of predefined regional tabs, like other apps. PREMIUM INTERFACE DESIGN Essential Anatomy 3 is designed with the user in mind - the body itself becomes the interface. Unlike other 3D apps, which rely on predefined anatomic arrangements and regional dissections to guide the user, 3D4Medical’s Essential Anatomy 3 lets you find what you are looking for without complication. ---- New 3D technology via 3D4Medical's latest graphics engine ---- Over 4,000 highly detailed anatomical structures ---- Multiple Selection Mode - Hide/Fade/Isolate individual or multiple structures ---- Preset and customizable Bookmarks ---- Correct audio pronunciation for every structure ---- Latin nomenclature for each anatomical structure ---- User friendly and intuitive interface ---- Multiple search options ---- Dynamic quiz function - Drag and Drop and Multi-choice ---- Custom search modes ---- Extensive social media tools and sharing capability Please find our End User License Agreement here: http://applications.3d4medical.com/eula Any feedback? We thrive on engaging with customers and, unfortunately, can’t respond directly to reviews. Contact our customer support at info@3d4medical.com . You will receive a response promptly!

description: *** Hundreds of hidden pics – can your imagination fill in the blanks? *** --- A sequel to the POPULAR game Guess That Pic! --- GUESS THAT PIC is back! This time there are more challenges and new pics for fun, long-lasting gameplay! The rules are the same: you will face an almost entirely covered photo. Your task is to find out exactly what is hiding by revealing as little of the pic as possible! Here is a challenging quiz game for your eyes as well as your mind! IT’S FREE! Guess That Pic 2 is 100% free to try! If you liked “Guess That Pic,” you must get this sequel! NEW QUESTIONS This version contains hundreds of new and stimulating questions! Challenge yourself for hours! SIMPLE AND STYLISH Playing is super simple! Have a look at each covered photo and spell your answer merely by clicking on the letters you want to use. GET HINTS! Not quite seeing it? No worries! When you answer a question correctly, you’re awarded “hint coins.” With these coins, you can buy hints that reveal more of the photo or a letter of the answer! If you want more hint coins, you can buy them in the app. How many questions can you solve? Find out now by downloading Guess That Pic 2 for FREE!
Make your way back to the mothership! Destroy the enemy ships before the destroy you!

description: Buy Lockers - Find Treasure! Do you have the insight to see the true value of a virtual storage unit? Are you tired of competing with boring NPCs? Looking for more challenging players? - Single Player Campaign & Local Multiplayer Matches - 20,000 Lockers to Discover, with Rare and Unique Items - 27 Locations to Unlock across North America - 15 Opponents with Unique Personalities - 9 Skills to Learn - Online social leaderboards and achievements Multiplayer mode: Play just like on the TV shows! Storage League is the first multiplayer storage auction game which allows you to compete not just with NPCs but also with your friends and family members over the same wifi network. Single player campaign mode: 12 month campaign with unique unlockable locations, new challenging opponents and unlockable skills. Multicast permission is needed for local multiplayer mode. Find/use accounts permission is needed for leaderboards/achievements. In Single player mode, each league season is 12 months long. Try to get as many league points as possible to raise your ranking. You will be competing against a roster of computer controlled characters who have unique personalities and skills. Ask yourself: Does their bidding match your thoughts on the locker's value? If you think the competition is bidding too high, let them have the locker and enjoy seeing how much they lost on the locker. Just remember to look through the auction summaries and check the value of each item. This will help you in the future. Be sure to understand your opponents or you will be sorry. When you start a new game in Storage League, you will have $25,000 bidding money to start with. Be sure not to spend your money too quickly. Not all lockers are a good buy. This is Storage League for the big boys and not a Storage Game. It takes time to convert your inventory into cash. You can choose to take a discount to sell your goods quickly or to sell at a premium price if time is not a concern. You will be traveling throughout different areas of North America in Storage League, with a major focus on the West Coast of North America. As you collect enough league points and cash, you may travel to different areas and search for your riches and glory. Just remember, it is a long drive from north to south. Be sure you have enough money for the gas and the registration fee for each location. As you advance to different rankings, new skills will be unlocked in order for you to face your rivals and challenges. During game play, you can pay to look through each storage locker in advance. Search for hidden objects that you think are valuable. Don't expect to get rich on the first try, but observation is your key to success. Cash is not your only weapon, but insight, courage, and strategy are your greatest weapons to outbid your opponents in Storage League. You have an option to purchase skills that can be used before or during the auction. Just remember, riches and glory may not go together very often in this game. In Storage League Multiplayer mode, you can have a maximum of four guests (plus the host) in the game. You can use Wi-Fi to connect with each other. You can choose how many rounds to play, with each round consisting of up to five lockers. As in the single player campaign, you can preview the lockers and plan your strategy. You can also choose to have NPC players in your group. This is a fun game and a lot like the TV shows, with or without the arguing. In Storage League, the contents of every locker and where they are located in the room are random. You may find items that are unique, and you may require multiple playthroughs to find everything. Are you ready to become the next Lock Star?

description: GPS Auto SMS was born with the aim to send your location to a specific recipient , using regular interval of time . for sending text messages . Gps Auto SMS is the only application of localization , which uses text messages , so it can also be used in areas with low coverage of the Internet. So your goal is to let people know your position automatically even in places where the internet signal is almost absent . The use is designed primarily for those who practice all kinds of hiking , trekking, canyoning, mountain biking , etc. . But its use is not limited to hikers , in fact, the ability to send messages automatically, allows an infinite number of usage scenarios , for example , but it is only one, you can also use it to keep up to date on the location of their children or people care . GPS Auto SMS Free is a free but limited , in fact : it has pre-set time intervals , not notifications can be switched off and you can not set a limit of SMS to be sent . The Pro version allows you to customize the time intervals , customize the type of notification , whether sound or silent , and then allows you to set a limit of sending text messages , at which the application will terminate automatically sending messages . ################################# Available languages: Italian and English. #################################

Listen to classical music online or download classical music with this free android app! In Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky Music app we have compiled the best classical music from one of the greatest classical music composers of all time. Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky life (sometimes spelled Chaykovsky, 7 May 1840 – 6 November 1893) Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky was a Russian composer whose musical works categorizes as Romantic music according to classical period timeline, he is one of the great Russian classical composers and Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky works and classical masterpieces have become an important part of the history of classical music. In this free app for android you can choose to learn more about the composer in Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky biography, or listen to some of the composer’s most famous classical music free. This app is a perfect way to get to know more about the history of western classical music; everyone can enjoy this music, play classical music for kids and adults. Some people even play classical music for babies; there is theory that that this will make them smarter. Even if this theory not is proven correctly, this is perfect relaxing music for babies. Download Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky Music free app now, learn more about one of the most famous classical music composers of all time and stream music free android! Features: In this app Android you will be streaming classical music online, so you will need to have Internet access, we recommend WiFi whenever possible. However, there is an option to download classical music free to your android, this way you can listen to classical music from this app even when you don’t have Internet access. To stream classical music is a great option if you have good internet connections, you will save memory on your device and have a wide option of music to choose from directly in this music app for android. If you download classical music mp3 files with this android app you will be able to listen to music free at all times, even if you don’t have internet connection, but you will be limited to a number of classic music pieces by the memory space on your device. This app consists of Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky mp3 music only.

Learn the meaning and origin of the key terms of the Holy Bible. With over 90.000 entries, The Bible Dictionary will guide your understanding of the word of God and His son Jesus Christ. A required reference app for any serious study of the Old and the New Testament. * Over 90.000 dictionary, encyclopedia and concordance entries. * 8 full reference books at hand: Easton's Bible Dictionary, Smith's Bible Dictionary, Hitchcock's Bible Names Dictionary, The King James Version (KJV) Bible Dictionary, Nave's Topical Bible, the Condensed Biblical Cyclopedia, Torrey's New Topical Textbook and the Commentary Critical and Explanatory on the Whole Bible (JFB Commentary) * Very fast and simple to use. * Works offline, even in "airplane mode". Study the Holy Scriptures anytime, anywhere, no Internet connection required. Define any term, anywhere! * Search inside one of the dictionaries or all at the same time. * Powerful search system. With the amplified search, find any term and/or definitions using different criteria. * Big text option to improve readability * Bookmark your favorite entries for quick future reference. * Share any entry by e-mail, SMS, etc. * Listen to the definitions using Android's built-in Text-to-speech synthesizer with American or British accent. FAQ: Q: How can I share a verse from the list? A: Just pressing for 2 or 3 seconds and a menu with the available sharing options will appear Q: How can I change the speech speed? A: The speed of the speech is controlled by the TTS engine installed with Android. It can be set up by going to: Settings --> Voice input & output settings --> Text to speech settings --> speech rate Q: I don't like the voice. How can I improve it? A: The default text-to-speech engine installed with Android is Pico TTS, it’s pretty simple and sometimes may sound a bit electronic. You can always install alternatives like eSpeak, SVox or IVONA. Q: How can I change the speech accent? A: Just go to Menu --> Settings and select the language. Currently, 2 accents are available: * English (US) * English (GB) About the permissions: We know you may be worried about the permissions required by the application so here is the explanation of why they are needed: To load the ads used to support the development of the application, these permissions are required: - Full Internet access - View network state To save your favorite entries in the SD card: - Modify/delete SD card contents About the speech synthesizer: The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings. If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required. We recommend installing it before traveling as roaming data tariffs may be very expensive. Praise the Lord! God bless you! John 1:1-51 KJV - In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

description: 하루 10분이면 생활영어의 달인~! '이보영의 생활영어' 중 초급자용 생활 영어회화 과정 ★ 강좌특징 - 온 가족이 생활 편의시설에서 오가는 대화를 영어로 학습하는 과정 - 자녀가 일상 속에서 자연스럽게 영어로 말하는 습관을 갖게 지도하려는 현명한 부모들을 위한 강좌 ★ 학습목표 - 사회 생활을 하면서 여러 사람들과 나누는 대화를 영어로 할 수 있다. - 자녀들이 자연스럽게 영어를 구사하게 된다. ★ 학습대상 - 자녀의 영어 학습에 관심이 많은 부모 - 자녀에게 올바른 영어 습관을 길러주고 싶은 부모 - 자녀 영어 공부를 어디에서부터 어떻게 시작하게 해야 할지 난감한 부모 - 가족 모두의 영어 생활화를 목표로 삼는 분 ★ 강의목차 1강 Just Looking 그냥 구경하는 거예요. 2강 How do I look? 저 어때요? 3강 I’m a Big 230 좀 큰 치수로 신어요 4강 Let’s hit the Road! 자, 떠나 볼까요! 5강 What a cute couple! 너무 잘 어울리는 한 쌍이야! 6강 Good luck in your new place! 집들이에 가며 7강 I want to look like this! 이렇게 머리 해주세요! 8강 Taxi! 택시! 9강 I’d like to withdraw some money 돈을 인출하려고 해요 10강 Airmail, please 항공 우편으로 부탁합니다 11강 Keep Looking for a spot! 주차할 데 있나 찾아봐요 12강 Where’s the cereal section? 시리얼 어디 있나요? 13강 Any books on dinosaurs? 공룡 책 있나요? 14강 That’s our flight! 저게 우리가 탈 비행기다! 15강 Blow this one up, please 이거 확대해 주세요 16강 I have a bad cough 콜록 콜록 기침이 심해요 17강 The 8 p.m. show, please. 8시 상영으로요! 18강 Can we try the roller coaster? 롤러 코스터 타도 돼요? 19강 I have a cough 저 기침해요 20강 Play ball! 야구장에 왔어요 21강 All abroad! 다 타세요! 22강 It won’t start! 차에 시동이 안 걸려요! 23강 Buckle up! 안전 벨트를 매세요! 24강 Just say ‘aah’ 입벌리고 아~하세요 25강 Busted! 아이고 걸렸구나! 26강 Fill her up, please 기름 가득 채워 주세요 27강 Take line 2 2호선을 타세요 28강 Can you get this spot out? 이 얼룩 빼 주실 수 있겠어요? 29강 Do you have any changes? 잔돈 가진 것 있어요? 30강 Is there an intermission? 중간에 휴식 시간 있나요?

description: Google Admin lets you manage your Google for Work account on-the-go. Add and manage users and groups, contact support, and view audit logs for your organization. FOR WHOM? - This app is only for super administrators of Google for Work products, including Google Apps for Work, Education, Government, Google Coordinate, and Chromebooks. It provides the following features: • User Management Features - Add/Edit user, Suspend user, Restore user, Delete user, Reset password • Group Management Features - Add/Edit Group, Add members, Delete group, View group members • Audit Logs - Review Audit logs • Notifications - Read and Delete notifications
release_text: • Richer user profiles - with support for groups and several new attributes • Bulk actions on users and groups - adding multiple users to a group etc. • Send short messages to users when adding them or resetting passwords • Simplified user interactions on a new Material Design based UI • Bug fixes, including the "Insufficient privileges" issue that prevented some users from using the app or accessing the app on tablets

description: Your country is under attack! You are the last ultimate survivor who still can face and defeat the enemy forces. Defend it at all cost from enemy invader forces and became a hero. Allies forces have been spotted miles of enemy aircrafts and fighter jets to conquer and destroy your country, almost all of allies were defeated, so you're the last one to stay on and defeat the enemy. Air Attack Combat is 2D endless shoot'em all air plane free game inspired by ww2 war birds of steel, a must have action arcade fun game to have on your device. >>> Features <<< ★ Non-stop action against hordes of enemy fighters and bosses! ★ Power ups and bombs to help you in your mission ★ Unlimited shooting action in one ★ Touch screen controls ★ It's all for FREE !!! >>> HOW TO PLAY <<< - Use touchscreen to control the aircraft - Your fighter will shoot automatically - Destroy as many enemy air planes and bosses as possible to get the highest score - Use bomb button to help you to get through the enemy waves - Pick up different power-ups to improve shooting power and range, health and bombs - Have fun ;) If you enjoy playing our free fun game, please consider to rate it and share with your friends. Also, don't forget to like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/Deep-Dark-Labs/688025867903246 and +1 on Google+ https://plus.google.com/109817752779450058906 *Disclaimer: as this is a free-to-play game, we use 3rd party advertising banners and interstitial ads to keep it improving and producing more new fun games and apps. Thank you for been comprehensive. Thanks for your support!

Line Run is infinite running game unlike any other. Forget about jumping! Now it's time to something else! Your goal is to run large distance and don't crash on walls. To avoid wall just tap screen and you will change side. Features: - free - online high scores and achievements - compete with friends and whole world ! - very simple to learn, hard to master - extremely simple control - just tap screen to change side - simple, clean graphics - no disturbing elements

Koi fish pond, live wallpaper. New fully realistic pond: fish swim, swaying kelp, sun glare on the bottom of the pond. You can change these options: - algae - The land around the pond - Solar flare at the bottom - Add an analog clock on the bottom of the pond

description: Happy Yellow Duck is a new endless runner style arcade game with simple one-finger touch control. Your goal is to guide the duck to fly the longest distance. Instructions: * Tap on the screen to make the yellow duck fly. * Release to make it come down * Avoid all obstacles Features: * Cute character and beautiful HD quality graphics to appeal younger gamers * Smooth game control and precise physics engine for collision detection * Google Game Play services integration for leaderboard * No in-app purchase NOTE: This game has modest difficulty that is suitable for younger players.
release_text: v1.0.7: - Bug fixes v1.0.6: - Fixed a security risk issue in a 3rd-party library. v1.0.5 - Fixed a bug in in app purchasing using Google In app billing API v3 - Supports Android 2.3.x - Uses a new ad network with Privacy statement v1.0.4 - Compliant with new Google Play Ad policy v1.0.3 - Added twitter share - Fixed bugs.

description: Never miss the best sights on your trip again. Tripomatic allows you to pick attractions that you want to see and create a day-by-day itinerary for your journey. It is the best way to explore the places you have never visited before . FEATURES • Choose the best places to visit from our curated list of more than 100.000 attractions , covering 150+ countries - never miss out on the best sightseeing again • Plan your travel itinerary in just a few minutes - spend your time on travel, not on planning • Get weather forecast - what is the best day to schedule that river cruise for? • Use time & distance estimates - is the way from the station to your hotel worth taking a taxi? • Sync the itinerary across all your devices - you’ll always have your dream trip close at hand • Find a hotel in your destination and save it to your itinerary - always find a way back to your hotel • Enjoy detailed and walking-friendly maps - explore the city in the best way possible, on foot • See subway lines on the map in popular cities - quickly get around town like a local • Download offline maps and use the app offline (available as in-app purchase) - no more roaming fees • Download and print out a PDF guide - don’t worry about battery power. REVIEWERS SAY • Guardian’s Android App of the Week • Gizmodo’s App Deal of the Day • Outside Magazine: The Best City Guide App for your Phone • Also featured in BBC, The Telegraph, PC Magazine, TNW, ProductHunt and others GET IN TOUCH WITH US Check out our web planner: http://www.tripomatic.com Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tripomatic_com Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/TripomaticCom Contact our support team: team@tripomatic.com To access 1000+ destinations worldwide, download the full-fledged Tripomatic app for free. Available at http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tripomatic
release_text: ✓ Enjoy the brand new design. ✓ Use Tripomatic offline. ✓ Book your hotel instantly from the app. ✓ Enjoy beautiful custom made maps.

description: Jízdenky na pražskou městskou hromadnou dopravu ve vašem mobilu! Oficiální aplikace Dopravního podniku hlavního města Prahy. Rychlé a pohodlné pořízení jízdenky. Pokud používáte různé druhy jízdenek, pak je tu pro vás aplikace nabízející všechny typy v současnosti nabízených SMS jízdenek. Podle toho, jak dlouho budete cestovat nebo kolikrát použijete městskou hromadnou dopravu, si zakoupíte jízdenku. Po nahrání aplikace budete mít k dispozici jízdenku na 90 minut za 32 korun, na 30 minut za 24 korun, nebo jízdenku na 24 hodin (1 den) či 72 hodin (3 dny). Aplikaci můžete využít pouze se SIM kartou českých operátorů a se zprovozněnou službou Premium SMS. Před prvním použitím si pečlivě přečtěte podmínky využití SMS jízdenky v pražské městské hromadné dopravě!

app_name: 個人向け野球スコアブック My Scorebook
description: 打撃結果を入力するだけで、打席結果や打点、盗塁成功数・挑戦数、総出塁数、得点数を蓄積して集計します。 ・打率 ・本塁打率 ・得点圏打率 ・長打率 ・出塁率 ・OPS ・盗塁成功率 ・RC27 を自動計算するほか、試合ごと・期間指定での集計、投手の左右別計算に対応しています。 打率、得点圏打率などの推移はグラフ化し、打球方向の分布も一目でわかるように表示します。 SDカード経由でデータの引き継ぎが可能です。機種変更しても大丈夫！ 蓄積した成績はTwitter、Facebookに投稿してシェアしましょう！ ※2013/4/15追記 【開発者にお問い合わせいただいた方々へ】 こちらから返信する際、エラーメッセージが返ってくることが多々ございます。 送信前に、迷惑メールの設定で「パソコンからのメール（gmail.comドメイン）が受信できる」ようになっているか、今一度確認をお願い致します。 アップデート情報----------------------------- ver1.2.0 (2015/4/1) ・試合ごとにメモを書けるようになりました。 ・登録画面で、画面上部をクリックでも登録ができるようになりました。 ver1.1.1 (2013/7/13) ・トップ画面で表示される簡易成績表示の計算式(OPS)を修正しました。 　閲覧画面の計算に影響はありません。 ・成績を期間で絞り込む機能に、前回入力した日付(from)をワンクリックで呼び出す機能を追加しました。 ver1.1.0 ・出塁率、長打率の計算方法を修正しました。 ・Twitter API 1.1に対応しました。 ver1.0.2 ・失策（エラー）が 打数に加算されていない不具合を修正しました。 　「凡打」に分類されるように修正されています。 ver1.0.1 ・出塁率の計算方法を修正しました。 ・成績表示の数値表示位置を改善しました。 ・その他不具合を修正しました。 ver1.0.0 公開 Simply enter the batting result, bat results and RBIs, stolen base success number and Challenge number, total-base number, and then aggregated to accumulate a score number. · Batting average · Home run rate -Scoring position batting average -Slugging percentage -Base percentage · OPS -Stolen base success rate · RC27 In addition to automatically calculate the, aggregation in the game per-period specified, it corresponds to the left and right by the calculation of the pitcher. Batting average, transition, such as scoring position batting average is graphed, it is displayed as distribution of the hitting direction at a glance. Is possible takeover of data via the SD card. And okay to change the model! the accumulated grades Twitter, let's share by posting to Facebook! ※ 2013/4/15 postscript [To people and you contact the developer] When you reply from here, there are many that error message is returned. Before transmission, junk mail settings "can receive mail (gmail.com domain) from the personal computer" as to have either been, thank you once the confirmation now. Update Information ----------------------------- ver1.2.0 (2015/4/1) · I now write a note to each game. • In the registration screen, can now also be registered in click the top of the screen. ver1.1.1 (2013/7/13) And simple performance display of formulas that are displayed on the top screen (OPS) I was corrected. Does not affect the calculation of the viewing screen. · Performance to function Filter by period, we have added the ability to call the last date you enter the (from) with one click. ver1.1.0 -Base percentage, I was fixed method of calculating slugging percentage. · I now supports Twitter API 1.1. ver1.0.2 · Blunders (error) I Fixed bug that has not been added to the bats. It has been modified to be classified as "mishit".   ver1.0.1 -Of-base percentage I was fixed calculation method. -Performance I've improved numerical display position of the display. And other I Fixed bug.   ver1.0.0 Publication

description: Birçok besine ait kalori değerlerini bulabileceğiniz bu uygulamada ayrıca günlük ihtiyacınız olan kalori miktarını çok basit bir şekilde öğrenebilirsiniz. Boyunuza uygun olarak olmanız gereken kiloyu öğrenebilir ve bunun yanında vücut kitle endeksiniz sayesinde kilonuzun hangi kategoride yer aldığını bulabilirsiniz. Uygulamayı kullanmak için internet bağlantısına gerek yoktur. Many of the caloric value of the food you'll find in this application also the amount of calories you need daily you can learn in a very simple way. Learn how to lose weight you should be according to your height and your weight through your body mass index, as well as the category in which you will find that it takes. You do not need an internet connection to use the application.
A toolbar/dock that can be accessed from the status bar that allows access to system settings, applications and application shortcuts without the need for leaving your current application.
release_text: V1.0.7 - Additional Gingerbread themed Icon - Fixed gap in status bar when Icon is disabled. - New Icon V1.0.8 - Fixed text color

description: The Chocolate Cupcake Maker game is a fun and fantastic game for any chocolate lovers who would love to make their own chocolate cupcakes to try. This cupcake cooking game allows you to easily work through each step of the recipe, and cut and mix the ingredients together ready for cooking. Once your cakes are cooked you can easily decorate your cupcake just the way you like it! Ideal for any cupcake lover, this cooking game for girls can keep you entertained for hours at a time. So if you love cake cooking, and you love cupcakes and chocolate, then why not play the chocolate cupcake maker cooking game now.

Fußball ist Begeisterung, ist Hingabe und Emotion. All dies kannst Du hautnah erleben – mit der offiziellen App des Deutschen Fußball-Bundes (DFB) die jetzt in neuem Gewand erstrahlt. Einfach installieren und alle News zu den Nationalmannschaften, den Wettbewerben, Ligen und vielen weiteren Aktivitäten des DFB landen immer blitzschnell auf Deinem Smartphone oder Tablet. Die Fans des deutschen Fußballs sind jetzt noch dichter dran: an den Nationalmannschaften, an den Partien der besten deutschen Ligen, an den verschiedensten Fußball-Veranstaltungen. Ob aktuelle News, Liveticker oder Videobereich – mit der DFB-App bist Du in Text, Bild und Video immer auf dem neusten Stand. Ob Team-Details, aktuelle Magazine oder das spannende Tippspiel – die ganze Welt des Fußballs passt jetzt in Deine Hosentasche. Die DFB-App bietet Dir einen Knaller nach dem anderen. Mit dem riesigen Videobereich entgeht Dir keine DFB-Veranstaltung. Ob Highlight-Berichte der Länderspiele, Zusammenfassungen der Spiele um den DFB-Pokal, das Beste aus der 3. Liga, die Junioren-Bundesliga, die Frauen-Bundesliga oder die sozialen Aktivitäten. Mit dieser App hast Du nicht nur das Gefühl live dabei zu sein – Du bist es tatsächlich. Denn über die DFB-App sind auch die Live-Events des Videokanals DFB-TV verfügbar. Und mit den Videos aus den Quartieren der deutschen Nationalmannschaften wird jedes Länderspiel für Dich zu einer einzigartigen Erfahrung. Per Video ziehst Du mit Manuel Neuer, Mario Götze, Alexandra Popp oder Simone Laudehr ein in die Teamhotels der A- und der Frauen-Nationalmannschaft. Tauche ein in die Welt der Nationalmannschaften, lasse Dich faszinieren von den Emotionen und fühle Dich als Teil der größten Fan-Gemeinde. Die DFB-App ist ein Muss für alle schwarz-rot-goldenen Fußball-Fans. Aktuelle Informationen, exklusive Interviews, interessante Hintergrundberichte und viele, viele Fakten. Hol' Dir die DFB-App, hol' Dir Emotion, Hingabe und Begeisterung auf Dein Smartphone! Football is enthusiasm, is devotion and emotion. All this you can experience at first hand - with the official app of the German Football Association (DFB) which now shines in a new guise. Just install and all news about the national teams, competitions, leagues and many other activities of the DFB always end up at lightning speed on your smartphone or tablet. The fans of German football are now even closer: to the national teams, the games of the best leagues in Germany, to a variety of football events. Whether the latest news, live ticker or video section - with the DFB app are you always up to date Whether team details, current magazines or the exciting betting game in text, image and video -. The whole world of football matches now in your pocket. The DFB app provides you with a bang after another. With the huge video section you will not miss any DFB event. Whether highlight reports of international matches, summaries of the matches of the DFB Cup, the best of the 3. Liga, the Junior League, the Women's Bundesliga or social activities. With this app, you have not only the feeling of being there live - you're actually there. Because on the DFB app also the live events of the video channel DFB-TV are available. And with the videos from the quarters of the German national teams will each international match for you a unique experience. Per video you draw with Manuel Neuer, Mario Götze, Alexandra Popp or Simone Laudehr a. In the team hotel the A and the women's national team Immerse yourself in the world of national teams, be thrilled by the emotion and feel like a part of the largest fan base. The DFB app is a must for all black-red-golden football fans. For the latest information, exclusive interviews, interesting background reports and many, many facts. Grab some the DFB app, Grab some emotion, devotion and enthusiasm on your Smartphone!

app_name: いつもNAVI (au版 地図ナビ)
description: ★★有料機能が30日間無料★★ ★★New 施設の出入り口を指定した案内★★ 「いつもNAVI」はゼンリンの詳細地図を使った地図検索・ナビゲーションサービスです。一番の特長であるナビゲーション機能は、渋滞を回避したルート検索や音声案内により、まるでカーナビのようにスムーズに目的地へご案内します。また、リアルタイムの渋滞情報や価格付きのガソリンスタンド検索、満車・空車がリアルタイムで確認できる駐車場情報、ナビ中のオービスお知らせ機能など、ドライブに役立つ情報が満載です。さらに、電車の乗り換え案内や、自転車用、歩行者用のルート検索も整備。自宅から目的地まで１つのアプリでご案内します。また、施設の出入り口を指定できるようになりました。これにより、駅や大型施設などで、目的地に一番近い出入り口までご案内します。 ▼ご利用料金について 有料のフル機能をご利用いただくには、月額300円(税別)の会員登録が必要ですが、30日間のお試し期間を設けていますのでこの機会に是非お試しください。ご利用料金は毎月の携帯料金と合わせてのご請求となります（auかんたん決済）また、会員登録を行うには、お手持ちのスマートフォンにてau one-IDの設定が必要です。以下の手順にて設定を行ってください。(スマートフォンのホーム画面にて) 設定->au one-ID設定 ※一部の機種で表示が異なる場合があります ★★おすすめポイント★★ -------------------------------------------------------------- ★ゼンリンの詳細地図（無料） -------------------------------------------------------------- スマートフォンならではの快適な地図操作を実現しています。 GPSから簡単に現在地の場所がわかり、進行方向に合わせたヘディングアップ描画も可能。 また、夜間のために地図のナイトモードを搭載。自動車でのナビも安心して行えます。 さらに地下街地図も整備。迷いやすい地下街をGPSが測位できなくてもご案内します。 -------------------------------------------------------------- ★充実の施設検索（無料） -------------------------------------------------------------- 名称や電話番号で施設を検索。500以上のジャンルとこだわり検索で強力にサポートします。 施設の写真や営業時間、定休日などの詳細情報も確認できますので安心して目的地へ。 また、価格付きのガソリンスタンド検索、満車・空車がリアルタイムで確認できる駐車場情報、ナビ中のオービス音声お知らせ機能、コンビニ検索などでドライブをサポートします。 ※オービスは有料機能となります。 -------------------------------------------------------------- ★ルート検索、ナビ、乗換案内（有料） -------------------------------------------------------------- 自動車や電車、歩行者、自転車のルートを、カーナビのように音声でご案内します。 ※バイブレーションでの案内も可能です。 ▼自転車のルート案内 New ・ゼンリンが独自に整備した自転車用ルートでご案内（随時整備中） ・ナビ音声案内にも対応 ▼自動車のルート案内 ・渋滞を考慮したルート検索、リアルタイムの渋滞情報の表示 ・ルート上のオービスを音声でお知らせ ・ タクシー料金検索、最寄タクシー会社検索 ・ 施設の出入り口を指定した案内 ▼電車の乗り換え案内 ・乗換に便利な乗車位置の表示、遅延情報 ・自宅から目的地まで、電車＋徒歩や電車＋タクシーを使ったルート検索 ・駅やバスの時刻表（カウントダウン付き） ▼歩行者のルート案内 ・雨の日に便利な「屋根の多いルート」 ・疲れた日に役立つ「階段の少ないルート」 ・ 夜間に安心の「大通り優先ルート」 -------------------------------------------------------------- ★その他の便利機能 -------------------------------------------------------------- ・天気予報（無料：ピンポイントで確認） ・訪れた街（有料：あなたの訪れた街(市区町村)の地図を塗り絵で塗りつぶします） ・ 登録履歴（有料：スポットやルート、自宅の登録） ・ PCと共有（有料：WEB版のいつもNAVIを使って外出前にチェックして登録） ▼こだわり検索 ・VICS交通渋滞情報（有料：リアルタイム渋滞情報） ・ガソリンスタンド（価格の安い順で検索） ・駐車場（リアルタイムの満車・空車） ・オービス（ナビ中の音声お知らせ New） ・グルメ（予算やクーポン、飲み放題など） ・ホテル（ホテルの空室予約の検索） ・病院（女医や専門医ありで検索） ・美容院エステ（クーポンつき、座席数など） ・TV番組・ロケ地（テレビ番組で紹介されたスポット情報、ロケ地検索） ▼検索できるスポットのジャンル（500以上） ※全て現在地付近から検索できます。 コンビニ、道の駅、和食、洋食、中華、カレー、焼肉、スイーツ、居酒屋、バー、寿司、回転寿司、お好み焼き、たこ焼き、ラーメン、ファーストフード、ファミレス、食堂、郷土料理、弁当、スターバックスやドトール、珈琲館などの喫茶店、コンビニ、マツモトキヨシやサンドラッグなどの薬局ドラッグストア、100円ショップ、スーパー、デパート、ホームセンター、家電、ファッション、化粧品、雑貨、書店、本屋、おもちゃ屋、ゲーム、スポーツ用品店、家具屋、メガネ屋、チケット、ツタヤやゲオのレンタルDVD・CDショップ、写真屋、クリーニング、宅急便、ベビーシッター、合鍵、不動産会社、結婚式場、葬儀、斎場、墓地、郵便局、市役所、区役所、警察署、消防署、保健所、公民館、銀行、大学、高校、中学校、小学校、幼稚園、保育園、専門学校、ビジネススクール、託児所、自動車教習所、運転免許試験場、予備校、教室、三井住友銀行、三菱東京UFJ銀行、みずほ銀行、りそな銀行などの都市銀行、地方銀行、信託銀行、信用金庫、遊園地、水族館、動物園、博物館、美術館、科学館、記念館、植物園、映画館、劇場、ゲームセンター、ビリヤード、雀荘、競輪、競馬、競艇、カラオケ、パチンコ、公園、バッティングセンター、野球場、グラウンド、プール、テニスコート、ボウリング場、ゴルフ場、釣り、釣堀、温泉、銭湯、百選、神社、お寺、教会、名山、夜景、名所、休暇村、牧場、駅、バス、タクシー、道の駅、カー用品、JAF、ロードサービス、自動車整備、サービスエリア、パーキングエリア、インターチェンジ、トヨタレンタカー、日産レンタカー、ニッポンレンタカーなどのレンタカー、レンタサイクル、ディーラー、空港、港、フェリーターミナル、ホテル東急、帝国ホテル、第一ホテルなどのホテル検索、旅館、民宿、ペンション、貸別荘、カプセルホテル、ラブホテル など -------------------------------------------------------------- ご注意事項 -------------------------------------------------------------- ▼渋滞情報についてのご注意 渋滞機能につきましてはコンテンツ提供元のライセンス体系変更に伴い、12月15日リリースのバージョン：3.0.0から渋滞機能のご利用には会員登録(月300円(税別))が必要となります。 お試し期間中、非会員のお客さまは渋滞機能のご利用ができませんのでご了承ください。 ▼サポートOS ・Android OS: 2.1/2.2/2.3/4.0/4.1/4.2 ▼動作確認機種 2013年8月7日現在 A02】HTX21, 【Xperia UL】 SOL22, 【URBANO】L01 KYY21, 【VEGA】PTL21, 【RAZR】IS12M ▼その他ご注意事項 バージョン1.0.1以前のアプリケーションからアップデートを行った場合、登録・履歴データは引継がれませんので、予めご了承ください パケット通信料が高額になる可能性がありますので、必ずパケット定額サービスをご利用ください。 release_text: ★バージョン305リリース★ 2013年10月8日 一部地図表示の不具合を修正しました。 ★バージョン304リリース★ 2013年8月7日 施設の出入り口を指定できるようになりました。これにより、駅や大型施設などで、目的地に一番近い出入り口までご案内します。 ★バージョン303リリース★ 2012年6月12日 ・ISW13HTにてアプリが起動できない不具合を修正しました ・その他、一部レイアウトを修正しました ★バージョン302リリース★ 2012年5月23日 ・SafetyRecとの連携に対応 株式会社データ・テックが提供するアプリ「SafetyRec」との連携に対応 いつもNAVIを利用しながら、SafetyRecで安全運転診断を行えます。 また、ドライブレコーダのように、運転記録を写真や動画で残せます。 対応機種は、ISW11SC、ISW11K、ISW12HTとなります。 (※「SafetyRec」の利用料金は「いつもNAVI」とは別になります。詳細は「SafetyRec」の紹介ページにてご確認ください)

Flowd – The Music Lovers’ Social Network Flowd is the perfect app to follow your favorite music acts! Flowd lets you chat directly to your favorite artists, find fellow fans, check into gigs and take part in promotions; get all the red-hot artist news as it breaks or simply discover new music acts! Flowd also brings you fabulous messaging tools to connect with your friends, as well as location based features for checking into places, gigs and parties. Connect Flowd to Facebook and Twitter as well and it becomes the one stop shop for your social networking! Features: •Artist pages & events: follow what's going on with your favorite music acts and talk with them directly! •Sync Flowd to Facebook and Twitter for easy management of your social networks •Places creation and check-in. Share your favorite spots with the world! •Public shouts and private messaging between Flowd friends •Take photos and send picture messages If you are an artist, you can sign yourself into Flowd with an artist profile on: flowd.com/artist_registration Download Flowd now for FREE and try it out! *** FLOWD IN THE PRESS *** “…this is a clever idea and could be extremely popular with music lovers.” – Mashable “Flowd’s location-based aspect has the potential to bring entirely new meaning to the idea of “closely following” your favorite artist.” – MacWorld *** FOLLOW US ON *** Twitter www.twitter.com/flowdapp Facebook www.facebook.com/flowdapp Or check out our homepage on flowd.com

The World Clock app helps you get the most accurate and reliable local time and time zone information for thousands of cities around the world. Find the current time and time zone information for multiple cities. Set an alarm in your local time for an event in another time zone. Organise all your most viewed cities in one single, easy-to-navigate page with a simple widget. _______________________________________________________________ MAIN FEATURES • Accurate local time for a large selection of cities around the world. • Reliable time zone and Daylight Saving Time (DST) related information. • Arrange Favourites to easily find the local time for your most viewed locations. • Add to your home screen a widget with the city you prefer, to track it's time. • Set alarm in your local time for an event in another city. • Variety of analog clock designs and types of display – analog and digital clock. • Easy to customise. Add many cities/locations to Favourites, which are saved. • Choose between 24 Hour Clock or 12 Hour Clock format. • Choose to show Dates and Time Difference in the Favourite Tab • Easily supports landscape and portrait orientation. ________________________________________________________________ timeanddate.com is an established company that first came online in 1998. We maintain more than a decade of experience in being an accurate and reliable provider of time and date related information worldwide.

Type faster and easier with an iPhone keyboard layout, while enjoying the cool features of the Android OS. Particularly useful for people who are used to an iPhone keyboard. Gingerbread & Stone layout also available. If you have a problem, use the support email. We are unable to help you when you just comment in the ratings. Don't forget to add a review! If you have a problem, our support is active and works well, try asking us before a negative review. This is an "Input Method" and must be enabled in the Language & Keyboard Settings. See author's site for instructions. Note I: Auto-complete dictionary is English only! Note II: Reports of landscape mode failures on Droid Pro. Test it within 15 minutes and uninstall for a refund. Note III: If your keys are too small, you can manually adjust them in the settings. BETA TESTERS: We have enabled beta testers for this keyboard. If you would like to become a beta tester, join our G+ community at https://plus.google.com/communities/106412562703484825925 Features ------------------ - iPhone Keyboard layout - Gingerbread Keyboard layout - Stone Keyboard (Gingerbread variant) layout - Multi-Touch support - Optional: Voice to Text Input (if supported by phone) - Optional: Always Upper Case keys - Volume control for key sounds - Key size adjustment when keys are too small. - Many other features.
